p0T Discord Theme
data.description: Ein Theme für discord mit den Farben des p0t. Wurde aus einem anderen Theme zusammengebaut. Falls es Fehler oder Vorschläge gibt, einfach bei Zerker melden.

data.name: Torn Tables
Discord Fold Channels
data.description:
Folds the Discord Channels panel, reducing it's width. When hovered over the channels expand back to normal size. Makes it easier to use the web version in a smaller window.

Update (17/10/2019) - rename `channels` to `sidebar` as discord have changed their tag

Update (10/07/2018) - now using better CSS element selectors that should keep it working whenever Discord deploys a new build.

OneCheeseOnePep's Roblox Background
Discord Simple Clear
data.description: Simple CSS for customizable background and bg opacity. Popular discord styles usually don't work/get abandoned for some reason ??? so I made this one which should be easy to update. Custom bg w/URLs: Upload your img to discord, then use that uploaded bg img URL Github and bg art credits available here

data.name: 全局暗色夜间模式
data.description:
夜间浏览网页时白色太刺眼？不如试试这个“暗色主题”吧！
不仅将惨色的背景变为柔和的暗灰色，而且鼠标也统一为黑色，Chrome浏览器默认的滚动条、图片也有相应的改变。
